title: Yobarete Tobidete Akubi-chan
synopsis: Koron Nemuta is a girl who yawns when embrassed. One day, she found a vase when she was lost. When she yawns, the genie Akubi will come out of it, but, when she yawns again, Akubi will come back into the vase.
staff: [['Sasagawa, Hiroshi', ['Director']], ['Ookubo, Tomihiko', ['Director']], ['Nakamura, Kenji', ['Episode Director']], ['Ogiwara, Rokou', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
